svg.text:
A cyclic token-ring arbiter composed of three blocks. This system arbitrates fairly among requests for exclusive access to a shared resource by marching a token around a ring. In each instant, the arbiter grants access to the first requestor to the right of the block with the token.
In this model, Block1 starts with the token (see the parameter of the NonStrictDelay actor inside of BlockN).
This example is from: Stephen A. Edwards and Edward A. Lee "The Semantics and Execution of a Synchronous Block-Diagram Language" Technical Memorandum UCB/ERL M01/33, University of California, Berkeley, CA 94720, October 25, 2001.

property.name: synag
property.value:
interface Request1__Block2__Block3__Block1__Request2__Request3 input .TokenRing.Request1.trigger, .TokenRing.Request2.trigger, .TokenRing.Request3.trigger; output .TokenRing.Request1.output, .TokenRing.Block2.TO, .TokenRing.Block2.PO, .TokenRing.Block2.G, .TokenRing.Block3.TO, .TokenRing.Block3.PO, .TokenRing.Block3.G, .TokenRing.Block1.TO, .TokenRing.Block1.PO, .TokenRing.Block1.G, .TokenRing.Request2.output, .TokenRing.Request3.output;
state a__a__a__b__a__a assume (1) guarantee ((.TokenRing.Request1.output=1)((.TokenRing.Block2.TO=0)((.TokenRing.Block1.TO=1)((.TokenRing.Request2.output=1)((.TokenRing.Block3.TO=0)((.TokenRing.Request3.output=1)) ) ) ) ) )
state a__a__a__a__a__a assume (1) guarantee ((.TokenRing.Request1.output=1)((.TokenRing.Block2.TO=0)((.TokenRing.Block1.TO=0)((.TokenRing.Request2.output=1)((.TokenRing.Block3.TO=0)((.TokenRing.Request3.output=1)) ) ) ) ) )
state a__a__b__b__a__a assume (0) guarantee ((.TokenRing.Request1.output=1)((.TokenRing.Block2.TO=0)((.TokenRing.Block1.TO=1)((.TokenRing.Request2.output=1)((.TokenRing.Block3.TO=1)((.TokenRing.Request3.output=1)) ) ) ) ) )
state a__a__b__a__a__a assume (1) guarantee ((.TokenRing.Request1.output=1)((.TokenRing.Block2.TO=0)((.TokenRing.Block1.TO=0)((.TokenRing.Request2.output=1)((.TokenRing.Block3.TO=1)((.TokenRing.Request3.output=1)) ) ) ) ) )
state a__b__a__b__a__a assume (0) guarantee ((.TokenRing.Request1.output=1)((.TokenRing.Block2.TO=1)((.TokenRing.Block1.TO=1)((.TokenRing.Request2.output=1)((.TokenRing.Block3.TO=0)((.TokenRing.Request3.output=1)) ) ) ) ) )
state a__b__a__a__a__a assume (1) guarantee ((.TokenRing.Request1.output=1)((.TokenRing.Block2.TO=1)((.TokenRing.Block1.TO=0)((.TokenRing.Request2.output=1)((.TokenRing.Block3.TO=0)((.TokenRing.Request3.output=1)) ) ) ) ) )
state a__b__b__b__a__a assume (0) guarantee ((.TokenRing.Request1.output=1)((.TokenRing.Block2.TO=1)((.TokenRing.Block1.TO=1)((.TokenRing.Request2.output=1)((.TokenRing.Block3.TO=1)((.TokenRing.Request3.output=1)) ) ) ) ) )
state a__b__b__a__a__a assume (0) guarantee ((.TokenRing.Request1.output=1)((.TokenRing.Block2.TO=1)((.TokenRing.Block1.TO=0)((.TokenRing.Request2.output=1)((.TokenRing.Block3.TO=1)((.TokenRing.Request3.output=1)) ) ) ) ) )
state a__c__a__b__a__a assume (1) guarantee ((.TokenRing.Request1.output=1)((.TokenRing.Block2.TO=0)((.TokenRing.Block1.TO=1)((.TokenRing.Request2.output=1)((.TokenRing.Block3.TO=0)((.TokenRing.Request3.output=1)) ) ) ) ) )
state a__c__a__a__a__a assume (1) guarantee ((.TokenRing.Request1.output=1)((.TokenRing.Block2.TO=0)((.TokenRing.Block1.TO=0)((.TokenRing.Request2.output=1)((.TokenRing.Block3.TO=0)((.TokenRing.Request3.output=1)) ) ) ) ) )
state a__c__b__b__a__a assume (0) guarantee ((.TokenRing.Request1.output=1)((.TokenRing.Block2.TO=0)((.TokenRing.Block1.TO=1)((.TokenRing.Request2.output=1)((.TokenRing.Block3.TO=1)((.TokenRing.Request3.output=1)) ) ) ) ) )
state a__c__b__a__a__a assume (1) guarantee ((.TokenRing.Request1.output=1)((.TokenRing.Block2.TO=0)((.TokenRing.Block1.TO=0)((.TokenRing.Request2.output=1)((.TokenRing.Block3.TO=1)((.TokenRing.Request3.output=1)) ) ) ) ) )
end
